review:
*** ** *** ******* ******* *** ** ******* ************** She has assistant who check all, and due to increase in covid cases her assistant will be in hospital Dr. Indra reddy will come to hospital only for in patients. OPD She is not handling.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor was not listening at all, was in some kind of hurry. *** *** *** ****** ** ********** *** ******* *** said she will deal with it in second session. Not at all satisfied with the doctor's behavior.

I had both my sons delivered at Sagar hospital by Dr. Indira Reddy. *** ** ** ********* ******* I would recommend her 100%She listens and answers all your doubts and is very calm, ever smiling and calm.

She helped delivery my baby in my mid thirties. Have had the best experience with Dr. Indira C Reddy. Very patient and takes time to explain everything.
During labor she was like a god send encouraging and motivating me which enabled me to have a smooth delivery. Will always be grateful for having met her.
I would highly recommend Dr Reddy.
*** **** ****** **** ****** Very kind patient and motherly . I definitely recommend her. She helped me deliver a healthy baby boy inspite of complications during pregnancy.
